pages.text: $(li)Crocodiles are hostile long green body covered in scales with sharp teeth mouths creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamp$(/l)s and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can bred them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l).$(br)$(li)After breeding, Crocodiles will come ashore to lay their eggs.
$(li)When a baby crocodile becomes an adult or on the death of an Adult Crocodile, they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crocodile_scute)Crocodile Scutes$(/l).
